#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
        long long a[10000000];
int main()
{
    long t;
    scanf("%ld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long n,k,p,ans=0;
        long i=0;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
        long long m=1;
        if(k==1)
        {
            printf("%lld\n",n);
            continue;
        }
        while(m<=n)
        {
            a[i]=m;
            i++;
            m*=k;
        }
        i--;
        p=n;
        while(p!=0)
        {
            ans+=p/a[i];
            p%=a[i];
            i--;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
